info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 26 at 9:07AM CDT until March 28 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi TX
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas...
Nueces River Near Bluntzer affecting Jim Wells, San Patricio and Nueces Counties.
Nueces River Near Tilden affecting McMullen County.
San Fernando Creek Near Alice affecting Jim Wells County.
Aransas River Near Skidmore affecting Bee County.
For the Nueces River...including Cotulla, Tilden, Three Rivers, Mathis, Bluntzer, Calallen...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the San Fernando Creek...including Alice...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Aransas River...including Skidmore...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...San Fernando Creek near Alice.
* WHEN...From Thursday morning to Friday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding occurs, with flow 200 yards wide. Lower sections of the Country Club Golf Course are flooded.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 0.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 4.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 14.5 feet late tomorrow morning. It is forecast to fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO FRIDAY AFTERNOON
